name: .PH File Extension
summary: Learn about .PH files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Header file that may be referenced by one or more Perl (.PL) scripts; contains Perl code that may include variable declarations and functions; similar to a C header (.H) file, but used by Perl programs.

content: PH files are often referenced within other Perl files using the require 'filename.pl' command.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
